name: Jai Bhim
summary: When a tribal man is arrested for a case of alleged theft, his wife turns to a human-rights lawyer to help bring justice.
stars: Suriya,Lijo Moi Jose, Manikandan K, Rajisha Vijayan
actorscrew: Suriya(as Chandru), Lijo Mol Jose(as Senggeni), Manikandan K.(as Rajakannu), Rajisha Vijayan(as Maithra), Prakash Raj(as I.G. Perumalsami), Rao Ramesh(as A.G. Ram Mokan), Guru Somasundaram(as P.P. Cellapandian), M.S. Bhaskar(as Sangaran), V. Jayaprakash(as D.G.P. Radhakrishnan), Sibi Thomas, Ilavarasu(as Gunasekaran), Jayarao(as Kathirvel), Sujatha Sivakumar(as Subbulakshmi Kathirvel), Ravi Venkatraman(as Inspector Baashyam), Tamizh(as S.I. Gurumoorthy), Kumaravel(as Inspector Albi Antony), Supergood Subramani(as Veerasamy), Bala Hasan(as Kirubakaran
story: Rajakannu and his wife Sengeni belong to a lower cast and works as labors in the field to protect it from rats thou they live life of poverty but are happy with what they have. Rajakannu and Sengeni plan a second child and soon Sengeni gives the good news once Rajkannu is called to the house of a upper caste man as a snake has sneaked inside his house.The next day theft of jewelry is reported in the same house suspicious raising towards Rajkannu .The cops got to arrest Rajkannu but he leaves the town for work following which the cops detain a pregnant Sengani and rest of family members asking them details about the Rajkannu.The cops trace Rajkannu and torture him and his brothers in jail asking him to confess the crime they did not commit later Sengeni finds that Rajkannu and his brother have eloped from the prison to escape torture.Mythra who teaches tribal village comes across a lawyer Chandru who fights for tribal people and after hearing story of Senegeni files a Habeas corpus case in court.

name: Master
summary: An alcoholic professor is sent to a juvenile school, where he clashes with a gangster who uses the school children for criminal activities.
stars: Thalapathy Vijay, Vijay Sethupathi, Malavika Mohanan, Arjun Das
actorscrew: Thalapathy Vijay(as John 'JD' Durairaj), Vijay Sethupathi(as Bhavani), Malavika Mohanan(as Charulatha 'Charu' Prasad), Arjun Das(as Das), Shanthnu Bhagyaraj(as Bhargav), Andrea Jeremiah(as Vaanathi), Nassar(as JD's Mentor & The College's Founder), Azhagam Perumal(as Principal Ambaiya Samuel), Cibi Bhuvana Chandran(as Sri), Mahendran(as Young Bhavani), Kulappulli Leela(as Juvenile School Cook), Gouri Kishan(as Savitha)
story: Master is an action film from India about a professor, JD, who is sent to teach at a juvenile reform school for three months. He clashes with an unscrupulous man, Bhavani, who controls the school's young inmates to cover up his own criminal activities.

name: Karnan
summary: Karnan, a fearless village youth, must fight for the rights of the conservative people of his village, due to the torture given by a police officer.
stars: Dhanush, Lal, Rajisha Vijayan, Yogi Babu
actorscrew: Dhanush(as Karnan), Lal(as Yeman), Rajisha Vijayan(as Draupathi), Yogi Babu(as Vadamalaiyaan), Nataraja Subramanian(as Kannapiran), Gouri Kishan(as Kokila), Lakshmi Priyaa Chandramouli(as Padmini), G.M. Kumar(as Dhuriyodhanan), Shanmugha Rajan(as Abhimanyu), Poo Ram(as Karnan's father), Subatra(as Karnan's mother), Azhagam Perumal(as Evil villager), Akila(as Village Female), Deepa Baskar(as Village Female), Madhan Kumar Dhakshinamoorthy, Dharshini(as Village Female)
story: Karnan, a fearless village youth, must fight for the rights of the conservative people of his village, due to the torture given by a police officer.

name: Annathe
summary: Kaaliyan has a sister who marries a young man without the permission from Kaaliyan and moves to Kolkata with her husband , where she faces unknown threats. Soon her brother Kaaliyan comes to the rescue.
actorscrew: Rajinikanth(as Kaalaiyan), Keerthy Suresh(as Thangameenatchi), Nayanthara(as Pattammal), Kushboo(as Angayarkanni), Meena(as Mangayarkarasi), Jagapathi Babu(as Udhav Paraker), Prakash Raj(as Nattadurai), Soori(as Pachakilli), Abhimanyu Singh(as Manoj Paraker), Livingston(as Mangayarkarasi's Husband), R. Pandiaraajan(as Angayarkanni's Husband), Sathish(as Angayarkanni's Brother), Sathyan(as Mangayarkarasi's Brother), Bala(as Arjun (Manoj's Friend)), Vela Ramamoorthy(as Kaalaiyan's Uncle), Kulappulli Leela(as Kaalaiyan's Grandmother), Sriranjani(as Nattadurai's Wife), Nadodigal Gopal(as Soorakottai Villager)
story: Kaaliyan has a sister who marries a young man without the permission from Kaaliyan and moves to Kolkata with her husband , where she faces unknown threats. Soon her brother Kaaliyan comes to the rescue.

name: Sarpatta Parambarai
summary: When Sarpatta Parambarai is challenged to a do-or-die match, will Kabilan, a young labourer, put on the gloves himself and lead his clan to victory, or be dissuaded by his disapproving mother and dangerous politics?
actorscrew: Arya(as Kabilan), Pasupathy(as Rangan Vaathiyar), John Kokken(as Vembuli), Shabeer Kallarakkal(as Dancing Rose), Dushara Vijayan(as Mariyamma), Anupama Kumar(as Bhagyam), Kalaiyarasan(as Vetriselvan), Santhosh Prathap(as Raman), John Vijay(as Kevin (Daddy)), Priyadarshini Rajkumar(as Missiamma, Kevin's wife), G.M. Sundar(as Duraikannu Vaathiyar), Vettai Muthu Kumar(as Thaniga), Sanchana Natarajan(as Lakshmi), Geetha Kailasam(as Rangan's wife), Kaali Venkat(as Koni Chandran), Tiger Thangadurai(as Tiger Garden Thangam), Kishore Kumar G(as Kabilan's father (Cameo)), Abdhul.
story: A Sports Drama film, Set during the 1970s, the film revolves around a clash between two clans namely Sarpatta Parambarai and Idiyappa Parambarai in North Chennai, which also showcases the boxing culture in the locality and also the politics being involved in it.
